name: Poke-cms
tagline: poKe allows you to create a website using Bootstrap 4
body:
### Contributions
If you have some sweet ideas for us to add to poKe, talk to us! We'd love to hear from you!

### Installation
To install poKe, just upload all the files, and go to your site url /install. (example: 'http://my-web.com/install') After installation is complete, be sure to delete the 'install' directory!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
